ğŸƒThere is a pact between Joy and me, because Joy belongs to me
ğŸƒThere is a word between me and beloved, because the beloved is my soul

ğŸƒWritten by him, the sultan gave me the order from his hand to say that 
ğŸƒHe will reign over me, as long as there is throne and fortune
